players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Bob was found dead so suddenly. We should be careful and keep a close eye on each other."
Diana: "I'm concerned about the sudden death of Bob. Let's all make a promise to communicate openly and honestly from now on."

You: "I think it's important that we all trust each other in this game. I suggest that we all make a commitment to be open and honest with each other from now on. This will help us build a strong community and ensure everyone feels safe."

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "I find it strange that Bob was found dead so suddenly. We should be careful and keep a close eye on each other."
